oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Charles Sauter
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: portraits; Sauter, Charles; Sauter family; yellow fever;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Notes on back: Charles Sauter. Died August 28, 1878. Yellow Fever. Olga 6 years, Arthur 5 years, Emily 3 years.
